movies.title: The Lion King
movies.review: Just about every choice Favreau made as director was the wrong choice, and his insistence on '100% realism' in a film in which the animals talk, sing, and do choreography makes my head hurt.

movies.title: Aladdin
movies.review: It's bizarre in a way that's sometimes funny-bad and sometimes just bad-bad.

movies.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
movies.review: The film that killed Star Wars.

movies.title: The Lego Movie 2
movies.review: A sequel that pulls time-and-a-half to carry all the corporate water the first one left at the bottom of a hill.

movies.title: First Man
movies.review: First Man never quite connects at a gut level. For a story that shoots for the moon, it has trouble leaving the ground.

movies.title: Batman vs Superman
movies.review: Lex Luthor's plan has so many plot holes as well as the script as a whole.
